name: BattleSpring2.0
description:
Warspring is a tower-defense RPG with a fixed turret. In each wave, players need to choose one of a limited number of 3-4 heroes as the commander to control the mobile attack, and deploy the others on the turret to automatically attack.  

Operation instructions:  

  •  Choose your commander, deploy your character, defend the crystal, and fight each wave of enemies!  
  • Control the commander through WASD, left-click to release the attack  
  • Using a commander for a long period of time will make him tired and slow down his attack speed, but he will also get a company bonus!  
  • Click on the character to upgrade  

战春是一款固定炮台的攻城系塔防RPG游戏，每一波玩家都需要在有限的3-4名英雄中，选择一个作为指挥官操控移动攻击，并将其他英雄部署在炮台上自动攻击。

操作说明：

  • 选择指挥官，部署角色，保卫水晶，迎战每一波的敌人！
  • 通过WASD操控指挥官，左键释放攻击
  • 长期使用一个指挥官会使其疲惫，攻速降低，但也能获得全体连战奖励！
  • 点击角色可以选择升级
